com.iha.emulator.communication.eserver.task

Class AbstractServerTask<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iha.emulator.communication.eserver.task.AbstractServerTask<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerTask<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckIdTask, CheckSensorIdTask, DeleteAdapterTask, DeleteSensorsTask, GetAdaptersTask

    public abstract class AbstractServerTask<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerTask<T>
    Class providing basic methods for interface ServerTask, that has to be extended when implementing task for EmulatorServer.
    Author:
    Filip Sutovsky
    See Also:
    com.iha.emulator.communication.eserver.task.implemented
